short_summary: Information Technology (IT) Solution for Elvers Traceability
description: department of fishery require an IT System solution to track and trace on all Elvers delivered in Canada

**Brief**:

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has a need to set up a high-value fishery traceability system for tracking through technical infrastructure for their burgeoning resource. 

We have a marketplace callout. Our focus is as follows:
1. Convert a level of industry involvement into industry led technical business recommensations 
2. Within scope planning and purchasing and advised at a procurement evaluation phase 
   a. Economically (i.e. "cost every segment in to consideration") 
   b. Techurratically Amendments 
   c. Rapidity Designs formation 
    
 This system is meant to support testing innovations and trials in assessments 

To remain requested please both make sure first to known yourselves that you can do the job as if you have both communicated please start the exchange only mandate your name and credets or paper anyone may read or access you for such artifacts different renovation  
More specifically, this project requires seeing a rational socially significant separation level by solved production
